Header: Putin and Modi take boat trip as they meet in Vladivostok
Content: President Vladimir Putin welcomed Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi in Russiaâ€™s far eastern city of Vladivostok where both leaders had arrived for the Eastern Economic Forum. Putin and Modi who are expected to hold talks on oil, gas and space later on Wednesday ahead of their visit to a major Russian shipbuilding yard, enjoyed a walk along the embankment before boarding a boat. India and Russia enjoy strong diplomatic, defence and economic ties. Russian Far East, located on the transport corridor between Asia and Europe, has unique geographical advantages and untapped energy potential.
